name: Slime Combine
description:
Combine slime to win!

Complete levels by placing corresponding slimes above all goals.

Use arrow keys or WASD to move
All slimes will move together!

If two slimes of the same type meet, they will merge, becoming stronger to form the next stage in slime evolution. If slimes of different stages meet, only the higher stage will remain.

If a slime enters an "X" deleter tile, it will be deleted.

If a slime enters a purple clone tile, a new stage-1 slime will spawn at the "+" start location.

Credit:
Font: "Thaleah Fat" by Tiny World
Sound effects: Mixkit.co
Inspired by 2048
All other assets (art, music, code) are original
